TF_fire_dot_desc: Fixes the counting of kills by fire damage over time
TF_shotgun_dozer_face_desc:
If one shotgun pellet hits an enemy, the whole damage is dealt.
This fix makes the game prioritize the pellet that hit dozer's faceplate over other pellets.
TF_gambler_desc: This makes sure you receive at least 1 bullet from someone's Gambler ammo sharing ability.
TF_shotgun_push_desc: Fixes clients launching enemies far away using shotguns. Disable if you use a better fix.
TF_dozers_counting_desc: Makes the game count medic and minigun dozers as dozers and apply spawn limits correctly.
TF_shotgun_turret_desc:
If one shotgun pellet hits an enemy, the whole damage is dealt.
This fix makes the game prioritize the pellet that hit turret's weak spot over other pellets.
TF_dozers_walk_desc: Makes dozers walk (not run) when near players
TF_cops_reload_desc: Allows cops to reload when they are moving
TF_instant_quit_title: Kill the game process on quit
TF_instant_quit_desc: Kills the game process when you click 'Quit' on Windows. Fixes infinite exitting and infinite 'running' status.
